/**
     * Encodes binary data using the base64 algorithm but does not chunk the output.
     *
     * @param binaryData
     *            binary data to encode
     * @return byte[] containing Base64 characters in their UTF-8 representation.
     */

/** * Constructs a new String by decoding the specified array of bytes using the UTF-8 charset. * * @param bytes * The bytes to be decoded into characters * @return A new String decoded from the specified array of bytes using the UTF-8 charset, * or null if the input byte array was null. * @throws IllegalStateException * Thrown when a {@link UnsupportedEncodingException} is caught, which should never happen since the * charset is required. */
